comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: Okay, guys. The Bitcoin price is a little higher than normal, which is why ticket prices for this artwork have been reduced to 35,000 sats per ticket.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: I was going through my raffle and lottery art threads and found two of them. One is this one without any tickets, that's why I must bump it, so we don't get lost!

comments.body: The Bitcoin price has grown over time, and that's why let's bring it down a little. I do want these lotteries to be a little cheaper.
